name: The age of procreation
description:
Polygamy simulation

==============================================

Language : Korean, English, Japanese

==============================================

The Republic of Procreation, well known of it's polygamy tradition.

Strong Sperma, the new president announces his election pledge to enhance procreation.

"Breed!!! And you'll be rewarded with 10000$!!!"

Inspired by this speech, a 26 year old lad with no assets, pictures his future.

Conquer thousands of females!!

Be rich!!

Abundant descendants!!

Be the President!!!
